page.title: 06UPHAM C.of E. PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The different subjects we learn at school are Maths, Computer Studies, English, Religious Education, Humanities, Art, Drama, Music, French, Gymnastics, Games and Crafts. The crafts we do are macrame, crochet, sewing, knitting, woodwork, pottery and cooking. For macrame we tie knots in string and make lovely things. For sewing we make clothes and felt toys. We crochet hats and shawls. In cookery we make cakes and pies and all sorts of delicious food. Volunteer mothers come in to help the teachers with these activities. We all try to be good Christians in this school, which is a happy, loving and caring community just like the village.
